snippet: American Ballet Theater, which went toeshoe to toeshoe with New York City Ballet, will end its five-year “Nutcracker” run at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
abstract: American Ballet Theater, which launched New York production of Nutcracker that was in direct competition with New York City Ballet's production, says its version will leave Brooklyn Academy of Music when its five-year run ends in December; production plans to begin annual run at the Segerstrom Center for the Arts in Costa Mesa, Calif, in 2015.
lead_paragraph: American Ballet Theater, which went toeshoe to toeshoe with New York City Ballet, will end its five-year “Nutcracker” run at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.

headline.main: New York Will Lose Ballet Theater’s ‘Nutcracker’
headline.print_headline: New York Will Lose Ballet Theater’s ‘Nutcracker’
